head.title: Metro Business Briefing; ZAGAT'S CHIEF EXECUTIVE

hedline.hl1: Metro Business Briefing; ZAGAT'S CHIEF EXECUTIVE

abstract.p: Zagat Survey in New York names Amy B McIntosh chief executive; photo (S)

block.p: Zagat Survey in New York, the purveyor of information about restaurants and night life, said yesterday that it had named Amy B. McIntosh as its first chief executive since the company was founded by Tim and Nina Zagat in 1979. Ms. McIntosh, who had been group president at Verizon's Internet and data services division, has five years of Internet, technology and marketing experience at Bell Atlantic and 11 years in senior marketing and operating roles at American Express.
